text: Approval for the addition of the trilock bps (bone preserving hip stem) to the list of compatible femoral stem components.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name depuy pinnacle complete acetabular hip system and is indicated as a single use device intended for uncemented fixation.  The device is intended as a primary joint replacement prosthesis in total hip arthroplasty for skeletally mature patients suffering at least moderate pain in the hip joint from non-inflammatory degenerative joint disease (nidjd) and its composite diagnoses of osteoarthritis (oa) or post-traumatic arthritis.  The devices inserts (pinnacle ultamet) are only intended for use with depuys femoral and acetabular components having matching outer and inner diameters.
